text: Michael Newbold Castle (born July 2, 1939) is an American attorney and politician. He was the Governor of Delaware (1985–92) and the U.S. Representative for (1993–2011). He is a member of the Republican Party. He unsuccessfully ran for the United States Senate for the 2010 special election. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Delaware's Governors * Profile at SourceWatch * News Meat Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Delaware Category:United States representatives from Delaware Category:Politicians from Wilmington, Delaware Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of Delaware
title: Mike Castle
